title: Remembering a champion
creator_contributor_role: Lockington & District Living Heritage Complex, collaborator
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs
abstract: Memories of Kevin Sarre - champion "gun" shearer
description: Made in collaboration with Lockington and Districts Living Heritage Complex, this short, comprising of stills, archival excerpts and narrative commentary, celebrates the memory of Kevin Sarre - a champion in an era when a "gun shearer" was something like a pop star. Made by Malcolm McKinnon and featuring Margaret O'Brien and Des Pentreath. Excerpt from Australian Wool Board promotional film reproduced courtesy of the Arnold and Saare family collection and the Australian Department of Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000347; Stories from regional Victoria; Active; 2004
